definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make a din or crash, crash into ruins (prh. akin to [[שׁוֹאָה]] (√ [[שׁוא]]) storm, devastation; >Aram. 4ho0 be deserted, [[שַׁהֲוׇוא]], [[שַׁהֲוׇתָא]] desert);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[שָׁאוּ]] Is 6:11 until cities have crashed into ruins; + perh. Na 1:5 (p. 671a).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּשָּׁאֶה שְׁמָמָה]] Is 6:11, usu., and the ground be ruined into a desolation, but LXX Lo Du Marti [[תִּשָּׁאֵר]] be left a desol.; 3 mpl. [[יִשָּׁאָוּן]] Is 17:12 they are in uproar (of nations, ‖[[יֶהֱמָיוּן ]]), v:Is 17:13 (but del. as doublet Du Che:Hpt Marti).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לְהַשְׁאוֹת]] Is 37:26, = [[לַהְשׁוֹת]] 2Ki 19:25 (Ges:§ 23 f Kö:i. 570, who follow van d. H. in giving [[לְהַשְׁאוֹת]] as Qr, but v. Baer Gi), to cause ... cities to crash into ruined heaps.
